title: The Terror of Tiny Town (1938 Western) Undersized Outlaws: Epic Showdown!

sources.title: The Terror of Tiny Town (1938 Western) Undersized Outlaws: Epic Showdown!
sources.description:
The villainous Bat Haines stirs up big trouble in the small frontier town. The Hero must outsmart Bat Haines, before his antics shrink the town's peace to nothing. With the help of The Heroine and a whole lot of little people, The Hero aims to prove that even the smallest among us can cast a large shadow when standing up for what's right.

Director: Sam Newfield
Writer: Fred Myton, Clarence Marks 

Main cast:
Billy Curtis - The Hero
Yolanda Travis - The Heroine
Little Billy - Bat Haines, the Villain
John Bambury - The Sheriff
Joseph Herbst - The Drunk
George Ross - The Lawyer
Nita Krebs - The Vamp
Paul Parks - The Henchman
Bill Platt - The Father
Otto Kruger Jr. - The Singer
Sunshine Twins - Themselves

Genre:Â Action & Adventure, Comedy, Musical, Western
Release date: December 1938
Budget: $100,000 USD
